name: Meemers Attacc
description:
You're a very fat cat,  attacc the birbs.

Start Game: Return or Start on Gamepad

Move: Left + Right Arrows or D-Pad on Gamepad

Attacc: Shift or X on Gamepad

Jump: Space or A on Gamepad.

---

This is a simple game made for my kids (6yo and 4 yo) to play together.  There are parts that aren't the smoothest, but considering the audience... well.. the kids wanted a fat cat that attacks birds.  And it definitely is.

Pixel art by me

Cat sounds by my buddy JustinYummerz

Music by artlist.io
